unnormalised: Arre bhai, stock market is so volatile these days! I invested ₹10,000 in Reliance last month and already it's showing a loss of 5%. Should I sell or hold? My friend, Rajesh, says it'll bounce back by 15/07/2024, but I’m not so sure. Any experts here who can give some advice? I don't wanna lose more than Rs. 2000 on this deal.
normalised: Arre bhai, stock market is so volatile these days! I invested rupee ten thousand in Reliance last month and already it's showing a loss of five percent. Should I sell or hold? My friend, Rajesh, says it'll bounce back by fifteenth July two thousand and twenty four, but I'm not so sure. Any experts here who can give some advice? I don't want to lose more than rupees two thousand on this deal.
